To use our app, it is necessary to accept our Privacy Policy. However, if you don’t feel comfortable to do so, you can use our free web-services on
Deleting a variable that is still in use is dangerous! Are you sure?

"This app offers a programming environment and interpreter for the visual programming language Catrobat. The source code of this app is mainly licensed under the GNU AGPL v3 License. For further details on the license see the link below. "

It is necessary to agree to the Privacy Policy to register or to continue using your account. If you do not want us to collect this data, you can delete your account via the profile page on our web interface. Then you will still be able to use all services that do not require an account.

"To offer you all the benefits of our services and the associated account, it is necessary to collect certain data from you.
• To maintain and improve our services (apps and websites) and to do scientific research on ICT and STEM/STEAM education, we use Google Analytics, Crashlytics, and Firebase, all by Google LLC (USA), to get metadata about the usage of our services, e.g., crash information, timestamps, visited pages/screens, usage of our apps and services, used operating system, and information about the network provider. This analysis and the collected data is not linked to your profile and does not contain any personal information (last bits of the IP address get anonymized). However, the collected data will get transferred to the service-provider (Google LLC, USA). Data processing is based on an agreement with Google LLC. This relationship to the service provider conforms to the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation (EU GDPR) and EU-USA \"Privacy Shield\" agreement.
• To create and use an account in our systems, and to inform you about necessary changes about your account per e-mail, e.g., updates or violations of our Terms of Use and Service, our community rules, or our policies, we will store your username and, if provided by you, your e-mail address. If you have connected your account via Google Plus or Facebook, we additionally store an identification key connected to your account on these services. We will not use this data for any other (e.g., marketing) purposes, unless you explicitly allowed us to do so.
• On a voluntary basis, you can give us your country of residence through your account page on the sharing site. This will get displayed on your public profile and only be used for statistical and research purposes by us. It can be removed at any time in your profile settings.
• You can withdraw the usage of the personal data belonging to your account at any time by deleting your account through your profile page on https://share.catrob.at. After deleting your account you will still be able to use the provided services, but not to collaborate, e.g., through uploading programs, commenting, or liking. Also, all provided content linked to your account, e.g., uploaded programs, comments, etc., will be deleted.
• To avoid misuse of our services, e.g., through user contributed uploads or comments for illegal purposes, all user generated public data (uploads, comments) will be stored internally in a database, together with a timestamp and the used internet address. This data will not be used by or forwarded to any institutions, unless sufficiently illegal actions are reasonably suspected and officially entitled legal institutions request it based on applicable law. Each case will be thoroughly checked on an individual basis by us first.
• You can voluntarily subscribe to the Catrobat Newsletter, on https://catrob.at/newsletter provided by us through the MailChimp service (The Rocket Science Group LLC d/b/a MailChimp, USA). You will then receive updates on the Catrobat project and its services to your provided e-mail address. You can withdraw the newsletter at any time by using the \"unsubscribe\" link in the footer of every newsletter. This newsletter is provided by MailChimp with whom we do have a data-processing agreement and who committed to the EU General Data Protection Regulation and EU-USA \"Privacy Shield\". For further details on MailChimp please also look up MailChimp's Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.
• All Services are provided by the free open source Catrobat project under the umbrella of the International Catrobat Association – Verein zur Förderung freier Software, a non-profit NGO incorporated in Graz, Austria (European Union). Our policies pay respect to EU and Austrian data protection law (GDPR). To get in touch with us, please send an e-mail to contact@catrobat.org or mail us to Catrobat, c/o Institute of Software Technology, Graz University of Technology, Inffeldgasse 16b, A-8010 Graz, Austria (European Union).
In case you are below the age of 14, this policy must be accepted by a legal guardian (usually a parent).
Catrobat's official English language privacy policy is available on the web under https://catrob.at/privacypolicy.
Version 2.1, 25 June 2018
Find the previous, outdated, version of our privacy policy (2.0) here: http://developer.catrobat.org/privacy_policy_2-0"

"In order to be allowed to use the apps and other executables offered by the Catrobat project, you must agree to our Terms of Use and Services. You have to follow these terms strictly when using our apps and other executables. Please see the link below for their precise formulation. "
"You are about to use this app together with Parrot's Jumping Sumo. We strongly remind you to abide by both Parrot's and Catrobat's Terms of Use and Services."
Conditions d’utilisation et de services de Pocket Code
"You are about to use this app together with Parrot's AR.Drone 2.0. We strongly remind you to abide by both Parrot's and Catrobat's Terms of Use and Services."
Before you can start coding, please read and accept our Privacy Policy to use the app:
La batterie est trop faible pour décoller à nouveau.
Aucune estimation de la vitesse de la caméra inférieure avant.
AR.Drone 2.0 Euler angles went too high. Motors shut down to prevent dangerous behavior.
Une ou plusieurs caméras ne répondent pas.
Un ou plusieurs moteurs ont été arrêtés par l’environnement.
Une erreur est apparue en ajoutant ce bloc
Cannot convert %1$s. This seems to be an old scratch program from before %2$s, please try another one.
"You can't open the program at the moment. Please wait until it's downloaded."
"You can't open the program because it wasn't converted correctly. Please try to convert it again."
Impossible d’ouvrir ce programme Scratch. Il semble que tu aies annulé la conversion ou le téléchargement du programme Scratch, ou que tu aies renommé ou supprimé le programme entre temps !
"You can't open the program just yet. Please download it first and then open it."
An error occurred while copying Project
Une erreur est apparue en copiant ce bloc
Insérez une batterie et essayez à nouveau.
We cannot run an AR.Drone 2.0 project on your device.
">You can only use the flash with a camera that has a one. Please add a \"Use camera\" brick and change to your device's camera that has a flash."
Une erreur est apparue. Vérifiez votre connexion Internet.
Insérez une batterie et essayez à nouveau.
We cannot run a Jumping Sumo project on your device.
Une erreur est apparue pendant le chargement du programme.
"Une erreur s'est produite lors de la création de l'appli."
Connect your wifi to the AR.Drone 2.0 and try again.
Connect your wifi to the Jumping Sumo and try again.
Merci de saisir un nom de programme.
"This app needs permission to write data to your device. Otherwise you can't create, modify or run programs. To continue, open settings and enable write access for this app."
"This app needs writable external storage like a SD card in order to run, but none was found. You can fix this by making the external storage writable or inserting a SD card, then trying again."
This app version is outdated. Update now?
"Ce programme n'est pas compatible avec cette version de Pocket Code."
"Une erreur s'est produite lors du téléchargement de l'appli."
"Une erreur s'est produite lors du téléchargement de l'appli."
Username should only contain letters (a–z), numbers (0–9), dashes (-), underscores (_), and periods (.).
Password should be at least 6 characters
Les mots de passes ne correspondent pas
E-mail address can not be used as username
Username should not start with dashes (-), underscores (_), or periods (.).
"Renommer un projet incompatible n'est pas possible."
Une erreur s’est produite lors du renommage de la scène.
Whoops! Our server did not respond in time, please try again later.
Your version of Pocket Code is outdated. Our Scratch converter only works on the latest version. Please update it through Google Play
Oups ! La conversion du programme Scratch a échoué. Merci de réessayer plus tard !
Whoops! The program seems to have disappeared or you might have lost access to it.
Whoops! Some parts of the program seem to be missing, please try again later.
Une erreur est survenue lors de la sauvegarde de la vignette.
"Une erreur s'est produite lors de l'enregistrement de la nouvelle description."
Oups ! La conversion de %1$s a échoué. Merci de réessayer plus tard !
"This script can't be added to a Chromecast program."
Vous ne pouvez pas envoyer un programme avec le nom \"My first program\". Veuillez renommer votre programme.
Définir le statut de la LED EV3
"To show your formula's current result, you can use \"Compute\"."
"Les variables et listes utilisées dans votre programme se trouvent ici. Vous pouvez simplement les insérer dans votre formule, ou en ajouter de nouvelles."
"In \"Device\" you can find information that your smartphone or tablet records. For example, the tilt of your device, or the loudness of your surroundings."

"With the formula editor you can create mathematical and logical formulas that you can use in your bricks.
You can continue through this little intro by tapping the \"Next\" button in the bottom right corner, and you can skip it by clicking the \"SKIP\" button in the bottom left corner."
"Like a calculator, the formula editor offers many mathematical functions. You can find trigonometric functions such as \"sin\" and \"cos\", a random number generator, and text and list functions."
Ici vous pouvez visualiser, mais aussi éditer votre formule.
"Comme une calculatrice, c'est là que vous pouvez créer votre formule."

"Logic is used to compare values and combine logical formulas. To compare values you can use logical operations such as \">\" (greater than) or \"=\" (equals). To combine logical formulas you can use logical operations such as \"AND\", \"OR\" and \"NOT\"."
This is a collection of values that describe your current object. Examples are the x- and y-coordinates, or the current speed.
Appuyez sur « + » pour ajouter des visuels
Scan NFC tags to add them
Appuyer sur « + » pour ajouter des Scripts
Appuyer sur « + » pour ajouter des sons
Short tap on a brick to open the menu where you can move, copy, delete or add a brick to the backpack. The help option will show you additional information. Drag and drop the brick with a long press.
To add a brick to your script, tap on the brick you want to use.
Toutes les briques sont classées par catégories. Choisis la catégorie que tu recherches.
Here you can find the different appearances of your object. To add a new look, tap the \"+\" symbol.
Your program consists of different objects that can interact with each other. To add a new object, tap the \"+\" symbol.
The script defines the behavior of your object. To add bricks to the script, tap the \"+\" symbol.
Here you can add new sounds to your object. Remember using a brick from the sound category.
Hit the back-button to pause your program. To show axes and the screen size of your device, tap \"Axes on\".
The current program uses Lego Mindstorms EV3 bricks or sensors. For proper functionality please connect the sensors to the robot as follows
The current program uses Lego Mindstorms NXT bricks or sensors. For proper functionality please connect the sensors to the robot as follows

Raspberry Pi IP / adresse de l’hôte

The mapping of NXT sensors to ports is program specific and can only be configured for opened programs!
Another device is connected to the Jumping Sumo. Be sure, you are the only controller for the drone.

Your program gets uploaded to the app’s sharing site where others can use and download it. You can also download your program as a standalone app.
If you enjoy this app, please rate us on Google Play.
